Package cz.cuni.mff.java.graphs

Class GraphAlgorithms

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.java.graphs.GraphAlgorithms
  • public class GraphAlgorithms
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements some of graph algorithms. Mainly it is if the graph is connected or not and minimal cut problem. All of its methods are static.

        Returns:

      • minCutBruteForce

        public static int minCutBruteForce​(Graph G)
        Recursive algorithm on min cut with brute force.
        Parameters:
        G - Is the given graph.
        Returns:
        The number of the min cut.

      • minCutProb

        public static int minCutProb​(Graph G)
        Minimal cut using probability. Single step is repeated exactly as many times as the number of vertices. And then choosing the minimum.
        Parameters:
        G - Is the given graph.
        Returns:
        The size of the min cut.

      • minCutVisualize

                                   java.lang.String filePath)
        Visualize the probability algorithm of the min cut problem.
        Parameters:
        G - Is the given graph.
        filePath - Is the path to the export file (in markdown).

        public static boolean isStronglyConnected​(Graph G)
        If the graph is directed go by the edge directions.
        Parameters:
        G - Is the given graph.
        Returns:
        True if the Graph is strongly connected.
